pages.title: Altar of Knowledge
pages.text: With the help of this block you can spend the $(l:e_mechanic_skillpoints)Skillpoints/el you earned to learn new $(l:e_skill_overview)Skills/el. If you don't have enough resources to craft this altar, you can try to find it instead as part of the $(l:e_structure_shrine)Shrine structure/el.
This block does not require $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el to function.
